title: The age of A and B are in the ratio of 9: 4, seven years hence the ratio of their ages will be 5 : 3. What is their present age? - Quora

response.answer_text: Friends…! The age of A and B are in the ratio of 9: 4. Let the rational between between ages of A and B be x Thus the respective present ages of A is 9x and of B is 4x Seven years hence, the ratio of their ages will be 5 : 3. Seven years hence, their ages will be. A's age 9x + 7 and B's age 4x +7. Their ratio 9x + 7 / 4x + 7 = 5/3 Cross multiplication 3 (9x +7) = 5 (4x + 7) 27x + 21 = 20x + 35 27x - 20x = 35 - 21 7x = 14 x = 14/2 x = 2 The rational is 2. Thus their respective ages A's present age 9x = 9 × 2 = 18 years B's present age 4x = 4 × 2 = 8 years Answer the present age of A is a 18 years and present age of B is 8 years

The age of A and B are in the ratio of 9:4 Can we define these two ages in terms of a common variable that simplifies to the ratio 9:4 (which can be written as a fraction)?[math]\frac{A}{B}\,=\,\frac{9}{4}\,=\,\frac{9x}{4x}[/math]9x and 4x are the present ages of A and BSeven years hence, the ratio of their ages will be 5:3 or [math]\frac{5}{3}[/math] Seven years hence, A will be 9x+7 years oldSeven years hence, B will be 4x+7 years oldSeven years hence, the ratio with their new ages will be [math]\frac{5}{3}[/math][math]\frac{9x+7}{4x+7}\,=\,\frac{5}{3}[/math]Can we solve this equation for x ?Cross Multiply:3 (9x+7) = 5 (4x+7)Simplify:27x + 21 = 20x + 35Move all the x’s to the left (subtract 20x from both sides)Move all the constants to the right (subtract 21 from both sides)27x - 20x + 21 - 21 = 20x - 20x + 35 - 217x = 14I bet you know what x is equal to !Divide both sides by 7→ [math]\frac{7x}{7}\,=\,\frac{14}{7}[/math]x = 2What are their present ages? Look at what we concluded in the first section:9x and 4x are the present ages of A and BSince x=2, their present ages are 9×2=18 and 4×2=8Be sure to double-check your answer. How old will they be in seven years? 18+7 = 258 + 7 = 15The ratio between 25 and 15 is equal to the ratio between 5 and 3Don’t just copy my answer to your paper.
